name: Super Air-er EXE
description:
Platform game project.

Defeat enemies and reflect projectiles in the air to gain more jump points.

Stay in the air longer for a higher style rating.

Z - Attack, reflect projectiles with proper timing

X - Launch, knock enemies into the air

WASD/Arrows - Move and jump

Git Repo: https://github.com/jh318/PlatformerDMI
